title: Shortening strings by replacing TH and IS

content.question: For which of the following strings is it NOT possible to use byte pair encoding to shorten the stringâ€™s length?

choices.label: Open quotation, LEVEL, underscore, UP, close quotation
Open quotation, MEET, underscore, ME, underscore, LATER, close quotation
Open quotation, NEITHER, underscore, HERE, underscore, NOR, underscore, THERE, close quotation

content.answer: Open quotation, LEVEL, underscore, UP, close quotation
